There's no time to waste. Life is short. Rock it.

entry.title: October Electric Guitar T-Shirt Design: Howling Werewolf
entry.content:
Halloween is almost here! This month's t-shirt design gets a theme for the upcoming spooky season. I cooked up tons of ideas this year for new Halloween designs, but I only have so much time to create them, so I went with my favorite.

I was browsing Halloween themed images online and this design immediately jumped into my head when I saw a werewolf. I knew how I wanted him to be standing and what I wanted the scenery to look like. I really enjoyed creating the artwork for this shirt and I hope that it will help get you into the Halloween spirit.

entry.title: September Guitar T-Shirt Design: No Soft Rock
entry.content:
More guitar t-shirts are coming! This month is the start of something new for Amplified Apparel. I'm going to be kicking out a new design every month. Why? Because you need more guitar t-shirts and I'm going to make sure that you get them! I know, I know, I'm the best.

OK, so it's not all about you. I really enjoy coming up with new design ideas, fleshing them out, and then creating the final product for you to enjoy. In this case I was actually working on a different, yet related, design when I came up with this guitar t-shirt. It's funny how that happens sometimes. The point is that I create these shirts with joy and I hope that you'll wear them with the same passion.
